review: I really don't know how I lived without one of these for as long as I have . lol.. I love watching movies from the Google play store and netfilx and this made it so much better with streaming to my TV.. I would say this is a must especially I'd you want a smart phone experience without having to spend a whole bunch more money for the same capabilities.. One thing I think is really cool is when its on stand by it scrolls through various pics from artists and even your own albums if you'd like even shows the time and the local weather.. The cast ability is pretty amazing and could be used for various apps from YouTube to even Google+ .. Like I said if you're looking to buy a new TV and don't feel like going all out for a smart TV this is a great alternative that works great with your mobile Android devices..
